summary: A deepfake is a video, photo, or audio recording that seems real but has been manipulated with artificial intelligence technologies. Deepfakes are usually pornographic and disproportionately victimize women. However, deepfakes can also be used to influence elections or incite civil unrest. Anyone with basic computing skills and a home computer can create a deepfake. Some methods to detect deepfakes use AI to analyze videos for...
title: Science & Tech Spotlight: Deepfakes
